title: Santana - The Early Recordings@320
description:
The music itself is pretty strong and usually well-recorded, if obviously less developed than the tracks that would be done for their official 1969 debut LP. 
A few of these, in fact, are different versions of songs that ended up on that LP, including "Soul Sacrifice," "Jingo," and "Persuasion." Much of it&#039;s given over to jam-like instrumentals that, though lacking in the focus and structural tightness of most of the material from the early Santana albums, are nonetheless pretty exciting, hot performances. 
Often, too, they boast an even more pronounced Latin flavor than the usual early Santana authorized studio releases, particularly on the cover of Willie Bobo&#039;s "Fried Neckbones & Home Fries." Elsewhere, there&#039;s a nice affecting soul ballad that didn&#039;t find a place on the early albums ("As the Years Go By").




01. Jingo                                                                                                               
02. Soul Sacrifice                                                                                                      
03. Persuasion                                                                                                          
04. Acapulco Sunrise                                                                                                    
05. Let&#039;s Get Ourselves Together                                                                                        
06. Latin Tropical                                                                                                      
07. Fried Neckbones (And Some Home Fried)                                                                               
08. Santana Jam                                                                                                         
09. As The Tears Go Passing By                                                                                          
10. Coconut Grove                                                                                                       
11. Hot Tamales                                                                                                         
12. La Puerta Del Sol     


Label: Charly
Date: 1999
